description:
A Beauty
Here's a terrific opportunity for an Investor or first home buyer
Very neat and tidy property with up to date kitchen, natural gas heating, air conditioning and 3 good size bedrooms with built in robes
Good size established block of land with garden shed, carport and access through carport to rear yard
Be first to inspect this home

Looking at getting into the property market?
First home buyer or investor? Either way, this property is ideal for you! Freshly refurbished with kitchen and bathroom this one is hard to look past. The kitchen offers electric cooktop, underbench oven, dishwasher and stone benchtops. Lounge has reverse cycle split system and overlooks the secure front yard area. Bathroom has bath and above counter vanity basin with a separate shower room and toilet. Three bedrooms are reasonable sizes with robes to two rooms. The rear yard is secure and has carport and container for your storage needs. Currently tenanted at $270 per week and showing an 8.3% gross return on investment. Call now for an inspection.
We have in preparing this information used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect to any errors, omissions, inaccuracies or misstatements contained. Prospective purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained herein.

When Position Counts
WOW What a position! Located in Queen Street Cobram only a stones throw to all towns facilities
This home consists of 3 bedroom, lounge/dining kitchen and rumpus room. Plenty of room throughout
It's on a very easy managed block of land, rear yard has fernery, vegetable garden and garden shedding
An ideal Investment or for the first home buyer. Phone 5872 1255, 7 Days

Renovated throughout
This three bedroom home has been recently renovated throughout and offers open plan lounge, dining and kitchen. The contemporary L'shaped kitchen has dual fuel cooker and canopy rangehood. Two out of the three bedrooms are generous in size and offer built in robes. The family bathroom has shower, vanity and toilet and there is a second separate toilet to the laundry. Climate throughout is controlled by gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling. Externally there is an outdoor entertaining area that stretches across the back of the home, single carport and sundry shedding. For the investor this home would be expected to be rented out at $285.00 per week. This home is ready to move into today!
We have in preparing this information used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect to any errors, omissions, inaccuracies or misstatements contained. Prospective purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained herein.

Neat as a pin
* 2 bedroom brick veneer unit located in a great part of Cobram
* Open plan living/kitchen/dining
* Small easy maintenance yard front and back

Great Building Block
Beautifully located amongst quality Real Estate and only walking distance to the river
Build your dream home in the New Subdivision in Cobram
Measuring 780mÂ² with all town services available
Quality homes being built around this block
For more information please phone 7 days 5872 1255

Display Title Prime Larger River End Homesite
Outstanding 620sqm homesite in prime location. Only a short walk to the banks of the Murray River, Thompsons Beach and walking tracks. An elevated sand rise corner block with two titles; measuring 620 square metres. All services available. Highly sought-after established river end location. The ideal block to build your dream home!
These details have been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.
Property Code: 3522

Retirement Oasis
An excellent 3 bedroom home located in the popular Oasis Village in Cobram
This comfortable home has a very open living plan, with electric cooking, 2 split system heating and cooling and very cosy atmosphere
Carport with neat and well-maintained gardens, garden sheds and close to mail boxes and community center
A must to inspect

More than meets the eye
This gorgeous cottage style brick veneer home has so much to offer its new owner. The home itself has beautifully renovated kitchen with electric stove and an abundance of storage and overlooks both the separate meals and lounge area. All three bedrooms have BIR's and share the family bathroom with shower, vanity and bath. Spanning across the whole rear of the home is a sensational fully enclosed outdoor entertaining room that can be enjoyed all year round with 108 degree views of the rear yard. Imagine living out here during the winter months with the winter sun streaming in!! The home's climate is controlled by ducted evaporative cooling and gas ducted heating. Externally there is some sensational shedding for anyone that needs the big toys housed including the caravan, boat and trailer. There are two single carports, one double carport and colorbond shed which is 6m x 6m in size. To minimise the electricity bill there are 16 solar panels on the roof. This home has so much to offer and will pleasantly surprise.

Impressive - Affordable - Perfect Retirement
Well located in the popular "Oasis Village" in the Murray River location, Cobram. This immaculate two bedroom residence is sure to impress.
Featuring an open kitchen, dining and living area with electric oven, ample cupboard and bench space, reverse cycle split system air conditioning throughout and vinyl floor coverings.
Both bedrooms with built in robes and ceiling fans. The relaxing front verandah has shade awnings and double lock up carport with auto door. The appealing rear yard is fully paved with raised garden beds and a garden shed.
An added bonus include solar panels with 60c rebates.
Inspection will impress. Arrange today!
These details have been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.
Property Code: 3454

The ideal first home or investment!
Situated just moments from the town centre, this three-bedroom home is an ideal starter for anyone looking to get into the market. With a rent potential of $320 per week, it would also make the ideal investment property. Features include:
Three bedrooms with built in robes
Master suite with walk in robe an access to main bathroom
Full bathroom with bath, vanity and shower
Fantastic open plan kitchen, dinning and family room
Access to outdoor area through dinning room
Spacious and secure backyard
Call Drew Cameron 0427 225 980 for your inspection!

More Than Meets The Eye
This lovely neat well maintained home is packed with features and sure to impress
Offering 3 bedrooms, great size lounge room, spacious kitchen and dining added sunroom and great outdoor entertaining area
With easy maintained gardens throughout and double garage with room to move
This beautiful home is definitely worth a look

Perfect Position
Centrally located within walking distance to the Cobram CBD, schools and hospital
This 3 bedroom weatherboard home would make an ideal first home or investment
Features include kitchen/dining area, good size lounge room and all bedrooms with built in robes
Secure rear yard with plenty of room

Neat as a pin
Immaculate 3 bedroom brick veneer home in excellent position.
Craftsman built with single lock-up garage, large living area, quality kitchen and split system heating and cooling
Fantastic yard area with pergola and in ground sprinkler system
This home is a must to inspect, it will not last long

First Home Buyer & Investors - Take Note!
This solid brick veneer residence is sited on a generous 960 square metre block in a very convenient location close to shops and schools.
Features a spacious open living area with cathedral ceilings, timber floating floors, reverse cycle split system air conditioning and sliding doors opening onto the large 3m wide entertaining area. Appealing kitchen with a wall oven.
Two generous bedrooms with built-in robes and ceiling fans. Bathroom with floor-to-ceiling tiles, plus a separate toilet and laundry. Excellent car accommodation with a four vehicle lockup carport, another single carport, and a 9m x 6m lockup shed with concrete floor and power. New split system in the home and shed, concrete driveway, custom built theater room/ extra bedroom in the shed. This property is of excellent value and is a must to inspect!
These details have been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.
Property Code: 3211

Perfect for the Lifestyle Lovers
Green Palms Village is a beautifully maintained over 55s Village based in Cobram on the beautiful Murray River. Equipped with a swimming pool, Community Centre with loads of activities including a library, pool table, indoor bowls and craft days. Plenty to keep you active within a small community environment.
The property we are offering is a low maintenance three bedroom home with quality fixtures throughout.
Open plan living with separate formal lounge
Kitchen has loads of storage, pantry, dishwasher, gas cook top, electric oven, built in microwave and large island bench
Master bedroom is spacious, has ensuite, walk in robe and ceiling fan
Bedroom two has built in mirrored robes and ceiling fan
Bedroom three is a tad smaller, with built in robes, great for a study
Large RCSS in living area and log gas heater in formal lounge
5kw solar system
Outdoor BBQ area with built in cabinetry with sink and range hood
Small workshop with power and bench space
You will be pleasantly surprised upon inspecting this 3 year old home with gorgeous lifestyle living, Book your appointment today.

Quality 3 Bedroom Family Home
Quality 3 bedroom brick veneer family home well located in quiet Cobram area.
Featuring generous lounge, spacious kitchen/meals area, double entry bathroom, all bedrooms with BIRs, natural gas heating, and ducted cooling.
Good size rear yard, large patio/entertaining area, single garage with roller door, garden shed and rear yard access.
Great first home or investment
Property Code: 3395

Laidback Modern Living - Nothing To Do But Move In!
Phone Enquiry ID: 76140
Tucked away in a quiet street right in the heart of this over 55s Complex known as Green Palms Village is this beautifully maintained, modern three bedroom home will set you up for a life of leisure and comfort. The village has a swimming pool and Community Centre with lots of activities to enjoy including a library, pool table, indoor bowls and craft days!
The open floor plan creates spacious living with everything easily flowing together. Sporting high-quality fixtures and fittings, fresh neutral tones and multiple entertaining and relaxing spaces - inside and out, it has been designed with both privacy and entertaining in mind. Three generous bedrooms, the master suite includes a luxurious ensuite allowing you to unwind in total bliss.
Low maintenance, it offers an outstanding opportunity for all buyers to take advantage of the affordable market and establish themselves in a well-equipped home. Perfect for lifestyle lovers, retirees, downsizers or those wanting to get away from the hustle and bustle and into a quality built home with lots of additional space.
The owners have improved the 3-year-old residence by adding quality extras including:
5kw Solar system (Very good for the power bill)
LED lighting throughout
Stand-by switches at the three TV points
Fans in two bedrooms
Inland bench in the impressive kitchen
Gas heater in the Lounge room
Deadlocks & security doors fitted on all house doors
Spectacular outdoor BBQ area with cabinetry and an inbuilt sink, specially built area for the BBQ and exhaust fan above
Small workshop with workbench and pegboard
It is easy to see the love and care put into the property. This is your chance to experience expansive, high-quality living that doesnt skip a beat. Presenting an exceptional standard of country living, now is the time to seize this opportunity and get into a great home with nothing left to do.

Everything You Can Think Of Plus More.....
As a builder's own family home, every aspect of this property has been covered to the highest of standards. From the impressive entrance to the dream shed, every member of the family will be very happy. The home features an open plan kitchen/meals/family room with Bosch appliances, plenty of cupboards, built in TV cupboard and sliding doors to the undercover courtyard. There are plenty of living areas with a separate formal lounge as well as a rumpus/kids room. The master suite has a walk in wardrobe and luxurious ensuite with double shower, behind-mirror storage and a separate toilet. There are three additional bedrooms, all with built in robes and ceiling fans, and a separate office/study. The family bathroom features a double shower as well as a spa bath. The large laundry has plenty of storage and reverse cycle split system air conditioning allows for year round comfort. At ground level is a three car garage with automatic doors and a handy storage room. Low maintenance surrounds with neat garden beds, paths and artificial turf - no mowing! Side vehicle driveway access to the yard and the 11 metre by 8 metre shed is a man's dream come true. The shed has concrete floor and power, is insulated, has mezzanine storage, and includes a gas log fire, evaporative cooling, as well as a fully appointed kitchen, bathroom and laundry. Ready for summer is the sparkling in-ground, solar heated swimming pool with water feature and lighting, and adjoining entertaining/BBQ deck.
If you are looking for a spacious, quality family home with something for everyone - put this at the top of your list! Inspection by appointment only.
Property Code: 1278

An Oasis In Green palms Village
This isn't your average Green Palms home. This lovely low maintenance three bedroom unit is perfect for you.
Filled with all the extras this home has a modern kitchen with large island bench, convection oven, microwave, ample amount of cupboard and bench space. Large open living and dining room with sliding doors opening out to rear verandah. Second living area with large bay window. Three good sized bedrooms; main with bay window, walk-in-robe and ensuite.
This excellent property really has all the amenities for you to live comfortably; Panel exterior finish, double work sheds, full outdoor blinds, NBN points, rear gate and vegie patch. Large outdoor area with TV points.
This impressive home is perfect for you. Enquire today!
These details have been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. Property Code: 3404

Great Home, Great Location, Great Value
This superbly presented, renovated three bedroom residence is sited on a generous 845 square metre elevated block.
In a great location this home is close to the Murray River bush land and walking tracks.
Featuring an impressive new kitchen with quality stainless-steel appliances, ample cupboard space and a generous breakfast bar. Spacious tiled living area, good sized bedrooms all with ceiling fans and built-in-robes.
The family bathroom has been fully renovated. Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling throughout offering comfort all year. Separate room under roof-line suitable for home office or games room.
Fully landscaped surrounds with fire pit and new 6x7m Colorbond shed with concrete flooring and power. Buy and enjoy with nothing to spend.
These details have been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies.
